text: karpit trong ban hamkhat champoh puok anak nouv satv slab ( del it ban saamleh tamochbab ai sla m) ning chheam ning sach chrouk ning avei delke saamleh daembi baucha mcheasa phe sa ng pi a l laoh . hetonih anaknea del trauv ban ke bangkham( aoy ttuoltean avei teangnih) daoy poum mean chetnea ning min leusa pi tamrouvkar chabach noh ku kmean tosapei avei towleu ke laey . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha aphy tosa mha anet sraleanh
